channel.title: Greatest Client Hack/Bot/Cheat/Auto?
channel.description:
I'd like to hear which you thought were the best.
I think the greatest was RuneBot. What do you think?

item.title: Greatest Client Hack/Bot/Cheat/Auto?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Taios, post:16, topic:125644”][quote author=Krichevskoy link=topic=175858.msg1619612#msg1619612 date=1185080411]

yar but think about it. IxBot was old bot when comps wern’t very good. So running 10 bots would be like ‘wow’. Now its standard, like with Aryan. A lot of people pushed like 15

It wasn’t that long ago
Anyway, if I recall correctly, ST-Shell was able to run something like 20-30 on a good computer a few years ago. Enough that releasing it to about 40 people (I think that was the count. Uriko?) clogged every available server. Since evo’s shellbot was in development longer than Jamie’s, I can only assume it was better.
[/quote]

Hmm, i remember the same kinda shell thing comming out with sbot aswell.[/quote]
I’m sure RichyT developed something along the lines of a shellbot, but I assume it wasn’t mass released to say the most.

[quote=“Aid, post:17, topic:125644”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=175858.msg1618767#msg1618767 date=1185058076]

Yeah, Ixbot and Aryan and AutoRune were sweet too.
But I still must say that the first client hack ever, RuneBot, was very very nice.
Have you seen what it could do?
[/quote]Not a whole lot, IIRC, it had a simple autofighter and some other features

Ixbot was able to do anything, and you were able to run over 10 bots at once with ease.

well if he was referring to the runebot by Vee it was VERY amazing for what it could do at the time. But that was before they started obfuscating the client :).[/quote]
Truesay, but my argument still stands that Ix is by far the most advanced and best bot ever created

Read full topic

But I still must say that the first client hack ever, RuneBot, was very very nice.
Have you seen what it could do?
[/quote]Not a whole lot, IIRC, it had a simple autofighter and some other features

Ixbot was able to do anything, and you were able to run over 10 bots at once with ease.[/quote]
well if he was referring to the runebot by Vee it was VERY amazing for what it could do at the time. But that was before they started obfuscating the client :).

Read full topic

yar but think about it. IxBot was old bot when comps wern’t very good. So running 10 bots would be like ‘wow’. Now its standard, like with Aryan. A lot of people pushed like 15
[/quote]

It wasn’t that long ago
Anyway, if I recall correctly, ST-Shell was able to run something like 20-30 on a good computer a few years ago. Enough that releasing it to about 40 people (I think that was the count. Uriko?) clogged every available server. Since evo’s shellbot was in development longer than Jamie’s, I can only assume it was better.[/quote]

item.title: Greatest Client Hack/Bot/Cheat/Auto?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Krichevskoy, post:12, topic:125644”][quote author=Taios link=topic=175858.msg1619059#msg1619059 date=1185065143]
yar but think about it. IxBot was old bot when comps wern’t very good. So running 10 bots would be like ‘wow’. Now its standard, like with Aryan. A lot of people pushed like 15
[/quote]

It wasn’t that long ago
Anyway, if I recall correctly, ST-Shell was able to run something like 20-30 on a good computer a few years ago. Enough that releasing it to about 40 people (I think that was the count. Uriko?) clogged every available server. Since evo’s shellbot was in development longer than Jamie’s, I can only assume it was better.[/quote]
Yeah, only about 40 people were put into the STShell Member group or whatever it was called. Oh man, that destroyed RSC servers… IxBot was by far more powerful IMHO. If only it wasn’t abused so bad, he should’ve kept it as closed in as IxBot.

[quote=“ruler, post:9, topic:125644”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=175858.msg1618767#msg1618767 date=1185058076]

Yeah, Ixbot and Aryan and AutoRune were sweet too.
But I still must say that the first client hack ever, RuneBot, was very very nice.
Have you seen what it could do?
[/quote]Not a whole lot, IIRC, it had a simple autofighter and some other features

Ixbot was able to do anything, and you were able to run over 10 bots at once with ease.

10… i would expect like 40.

even ibot can do 10.
http://www.rscheata.net/ad/nexusownageot8.png
-screenshot

http://www.rscheata.net/nexusteaser/nexus16demo.avi
~100mb video[/quote]
OVER 10 OVER 10 OVER 10 OVER 10.

[quote=“Pwnd, post:13, topic:125644”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=175858.msg1618767#msg1618767 date=1185058076]

[quote author=I Am Olan14 link=topic=175858.msg1618477#msg1618477 date=1185050111]
Yeah, Ixbot and Aryan and AutoRune were sweet too.
But I still must say that the first client hack ever, RuneBot, was very very nice.
Have you seen what it could do?
[/quote]Not a whole lot, IIRC, it had a simple autofighter and some other features

Ixbot was able to do anything, and you were able to run over 10 bots at once with ease.
[/quote]Oh no! Not 10 bots!

F that. I could run 10 Sbots.[/quote]
OVER 10 OVER 10 OVER 10 OVER 10. Obviously you would be able to run more than 10, especially with you. What IxBot/STShell did was not even load graphics, which only created lag from the JVM, etc.

Taios:

IxBot was old bot when comps wern’t very good. So running 10 bots would be like ‘wow’. Now its standard, like with Aryan. A lot of people pushed like 15

Like Krich said, it wasn’t that long ago, maybe a year or two back. Running 10 bots would be like nothing for IxBot.

Read full topic
